meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference (Webex)

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the October 22, 2024, Commission on Disabilities Special Meeting Minutes

agenda_items.title: Chairman Report
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Kalkanli will review his attendance and presentation at the Governor’s Committee on People with Disabilities Quarterly Meeting on October 29, 2024 and his attendance and speech at the 2024 North Texas UN Town Hall on November 16, 2024.

agenda_items.title: DART Mobility Management Services Update
agenda_items.description: Tammy Haenftling will provide an update of DART’s Mobility Management Services.
